name: Princess In Kobold Dungeon
description:
Use only one button and help Princess take more treasures from Kobolds! This game made for a game jam.

Press the spacebar when the action icon is under the black arrow at the bottom of the screen. Each hit speeds up the icons. You must hit the icon at least once in 15 seconds or the princess will take damage.

Meaning of icons:

Black arrows - control character

Red arrows - attack in the direction indicated on the icon

Black up arrow with "speed effect" - jump, reduces icon speed, grants several frames of invincibility

Bomb - deals damage to the main character

Shield - character can take 1 more hit

Empty - no special effect. Increases the movement speed of the icons and restarts the timer like other icons.

 

Beware of traps and kobolds! Good Luck!

If game is lagging, try to use another browser or download desktop version.

Also this game avalible on https://liluo.io/instant-builds/af1e4198-b5fe-4e1c-8215-1397c6ba6d16
